subject: p18767957
History: Postoperative, to assess for fluid overload before transfusing.
Findings: In comparison with study of, there are slightly lower lung volumes. There is enlargement of the cardiac silhouette with engorgement of indistinct pulmonary vessels consistent with some elevated pulmonary venous pressure. The left hemidiaphragm is not as well seen, suggesting volume loss in the left lower lobe and possible left effusion.
